rss.channel:
医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
严重的 COVID-19 可能会导致先天免疫系统发生长期变化美国国立卫生研究院下属的国家过敏和传染病研究所资助的一项小型研究表明，严重的 COVID-19 可能会导致先天免疫系统发生长期改变，而先天免疫系统是抵御病原体的第一道防线。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230818/Severe-COVID-19-may-cause-long-term-changes-to-innate-immune-system.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230818/Severe-COVID-19-may-cause-long-term-changes-to-innate-immune-system.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=46c7428a-3f00-4233-83f9-ed190765080b Fri, 18 Aug 2023 14:44:00 -0400 Severe COVID-19 may cause long-term changes to innate immune system
RARα 受体在 T 细胞激活中发挥意想不到的作用根据《免疫》杂志的新研究，T 细胞有一个核受体，它可以做一些非常奇怪但非常重要的事情，帮助它们对抗病原体并摧毁癌细胞。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230818/RARceb1-receptor-plays-unexpected-role-in-T-cell-activation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230818/RARceb1-receptor-plays-unexpected-role-in-T-cell-activation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=781a6634-2ed9-4841-b8c3-d817455d509a Fri, 18 Aug 2023 14:32:00 -0400 RARα receptor plays unexpected role in T cell activation
杜兰大学、Ochsner Health 和 RH Impact 拨款 1,650 万美元，以解决路易斯安那州孕产妇死亡率高的问题杜兰大学、Ochsner Health 和社区非营利组织 RH Impact 获得美国国立卫生研究院提供的为期七年、价值 1650 万美元的拨款，用于建立一个卓越研究中心，专注于寻找解决路易斯安那州过高孕产妇死亡率的解决方案。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230818/Tulane-Ochsner-Health-and-RH-Impact-awarded-24165-million-grant-to-address-Louisianas-high-maternal-mortality-rate。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230818/Tulane-Ochsner-Health-and-RH-Impact-awarded-24165-million-grant-to-address-Louisianas-high-maternal-mortality-rate。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1b45d0ab-f2ca-4d06-b9b5-b1bc37ff03cf Fri, 18 Aug 2023 13:47:00 -0400 Tulane, Ochsner Health and RH Impact awarded $16.5 million grant to address Louisiana's high maternal mortality rate
荟萃分析报告全球成人 MAFLD 患病率为 38.8%非酒精性脂肪肝 (NAFLD) 是一种常见疾病，影响普通人群中高达 30% 的成年人。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230818/Meta-analysis-reports-global-prevalence-of-MAFLD-of-38825-in-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230818/Meta-analysis-reports-global-prevalence-of-MAFLD-of-38825-in-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8e96a491-6dc6-4298-b826-7d026a4a7b23 Fri, 18 Aug 2023 12:06:00 -0400 Meta-analysis reports global prevalence of MAFLD of 38.8% in adults
日本松鼠可能是人类淀粉样变性的模型东京农工大学 Tomoaki Murakami 博士领导的一个研究小组发现，纤维蛋白原 Aα 链淀粉样变性是一种以前未报道的人类以外动物疾病，在日本松鼠 (Sciurus lis) 中非常普遍。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230818/Japan-squirrels-may-be-a-model-for- human-amyloidosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230818/Japan-squirrels-may-be-a-model-for- human-amyloidosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e66eed7a-07cb-4730-8c41-8bfff1721afd Fri, 18 Aug 2023 11:54:00 -0400 Japanese squirrels may be a model for human amyloidosis
普克鲁胺有望成为潜在的 COVID-19 治疗药物在新冠疫情大流行之初，男性患重病和死亡的比例似乎更高，这导致研究人员怀疑与睾酮等激素结合的雄激素受体与 SARS-CoV-2 病毒感染之间存在联系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230818/Proxalutamide-shows-promise-as-潜在-COVID-19-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230818/Proxalutamide-shows-promise-as-潜在-COVID-19-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=816d1639-18cf-4097-a878-2fbd1f427b26 Fri, 18 Aug 2023 11:49:00 -0400 Proxalutamide shows promise as potential COVID-19 treatment
独居痴呆症患者面临医疗问题、自我忽视的风险据估计，四分之一患有痴呆症或轻度认知障碍的美国老年人独自生活，面临不安全驾驶、外出闲逛、混淆药物和不按时就医等行为的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230818/Dementia-病人-living-alone-at-risk-for-medical-problems-self-neglect.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230818/Dementia-病人-living-alone-at-risk-for-medical-problems-self-neglect.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ec0060cd-3b6d-4c1e-aab4-406b09ae9b58 Fri, 18 Aug 2023 11:41:00 -0400 Dementia patients living alone at risk for medical problems, self-neglect
肉类和乳制品行业游说遏制替代肉类产品的竞争夏季烧烤——美国的传统，是庆祝自由的代名词——可能会被明显不自由的市场所玷污。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230818/Meat-and-dairy-industry-lobbys-to-stifle-competition-from-alternative-meat-products.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230818/Meat-and-dairy-industry-lobbys-to-stifle-competition-from-alternative-meat-products.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=494a4d62-5da1-434a-a66a-ae7bb3dc5ce3 Fri, 18 Aug 2023 11:33:00 -0400 Meat and dairy industry lobbies to stifle competition from alternative meat products
发现与乳腺癌风险相关的新基因由拉瓦尔大学的 Jacques Simard 教授和英国剑桥大学的 Douglas Easton 教授领导的一项大规模国际合作研究发现了与乳腺癌相关的新基因，这些基因最终可能被纳入测试中，以识别女性的乳腺癌风险增加。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230818/New-genes-linked-to-breast-cancer-risk-identified.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230818/New-genes-linked-to-breast-cancer-risk-identified.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e92fe11f-8379-4f9e-8f10-5021c406cf9e Fri, 18 Aug 2023 11:32:00 -0400 New genes linked to breast cancer risk identified
大数据和机器学习有助于对抗牲畜的抗菌素耐药性一项新的研究表明，在畜牧生产方法中使用大数据和机器学习进行抗菌素耐药性（AMR）监测可以帮助为干预措施提供信息，并针对对抗生素产生耐药性的细菌提供保护。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230818/Big-data-and-machine-learning-can-help-combat-antimicrobial-resistance-in-livestock.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230818/Big-data-and-machine-learning-can-help-combat-antimicrobial-resistance-in-livestock.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e47138bd-4c07-4aab-940c-fa0de49a319b Fri, 18 Aug 2023 09:52:00 -0400 Big data and machine learning can help combat antimicrobial resistance in livestock
